body_html: I've stuffed a few "security" holes in a85416d but I noticed another: When you from a new team, your own user is preset as the first role but you can choose freely between being a coach or a student. It makes no sense for other roles than a student to form a team, hence this shouldn't be possible. Any takers?

It makes no sense for other roles than a student to form a team, hence this shouldn't be possible. Any takers?
body: I've stuffed a few "security" holes in a85416d but I noticed another: When you from a new team, your own user is preset as the first role but you can choose freely between being a coach or a student. It makes no sense for other roles than a student to form a team, hence this shouldn't be possible. Any takers?
